about_the_game:
Fuck the Hell Out is a relentless top-down action shooter that thrusts players into the role of a cosmic liberator. In this brutal and fast-paced game, you'll battle demonic pests infesting the endless expanse of space. Armed with an extensive arsenal, you'll shatter skulls, demolish their hope of victory, and instill fear into the dark souls of your enemies. Each battle aboard the cosmic ship is a fight for survival, with enemies dropping valuable resources like ammo and other critical supplies. The game's relentless combat and infinite battlegrounds ensure an adrenaline-fueled experience that keeps you on the edge.



Key Features:

  • Intense Combat:

     Engage in high-octane battles against demonic pests, utilizing a wide array of weapons to obliterate your foes.

  • Resource Management:

     Collect ammo and other vital resources from defeated enemies to sustain your onslaught and survival.

  • Top-Down Perspective:

     Enjoy a clear view of the chaotic battlefield, allowing for strategic movement and precise aiming.

  • Endless Battles:

     Experience relentless combat in infinite space settings, ensuring constant action and challenge.

  • Atmospheric Design:

     Immerse yourself in the dark, hellish ambiance of space, enhanced by detailed graphics and sound effects.

About the Game



Fuck the Hell Out is a relentless top-down action shooter that thrusts players into the role of a cosmic liberator. In this brutal and fast-paced game, you'll battle demonic pests infesting the endless expanse of space. Armed with an extensive arsenal, you'll shatter skulls, demolish their hope of victory, and instill fear into the dark souls of your enemies. Each battle aboard the cosmic ship is a fight for survival, with enemies dropping valuable resources like ammo and other critical supplies. The game's relentless combat and infinite battlegrounds ensure an adrenaline-fueled experience that keeps you on the edge.

name: F*ck the HELL out

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics (512MB)
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Additional Notes: Requires a system running DirectX 11 as a minimum. Graphics cards over 10 years old may find some graphics display issues. Unsupported video chipsets: Intel HD Graphics 3000, Intel GMA X3100, Intel GMA 950.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: 3.0GHz i5 Dual Core or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650 Radeon HD 3600 (1GB)
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Additional Notes: Requires a system running DirectX 11 as a minimum. Graphics cards over 10 years old may find some graphics display issues. Unsupported video chipsets: Intel HD Graphics 3000, Intel GMA X3100, Intel GMA 950.

short_description: Fuck the Hell Out is a top-down action shooter where you purge the vast cosmos of hellish pests. Crush their skulls, shatter their spirits, and dominate with your arsenal in endless space battles.
